name: Curve DAI/USDC LP + Convex
steps: Install MetaMask and fund your wallet with ETH.
Go to curve.fi and select the DAI/USDC pool.
Deposit equal amounts of DAI and USDC.
Stake LP tokens on ConvexFinance.com for boosted yield.
Track your yield on both Curve and Convex dashboards.
exit_plan: Unstake from Convex.
Remove liquidity from Curve.
Convert back to DAI/USDC.
Bridge to fiat or CeFi wallet (e.g. Coinbase).

name: Auto-Compounding Vault (Beefy USDT-BUSD)
steps: Add BNB Chain to MetaMask.
Swap to USDT and BUSD using PancakeSwap.
Deposit into Beefy's USDT-BUSD LP vault.
Enable auto-compounding.
Track your vault's growth on Beefy dashboard.
exit_plan: Withdraw from Beefy vault.
Unzap LP into USDT and BUSD.
Send funds to Binance or bridge to Ethereum for fiat.
risks: High gas fees during peak times

name: Lending Stablecoins on Aave
steps: Connect MetaMask and add the Polygon network.
Bridge USDC or DAI from Ethereum to Polygon.
Go to app.aave.com and switch to the Polygon market.
Deposit your stablecoins to earn interest.
Track interest and health factor in your Aave dashboard.
exit_plan: Withdraw your assets from Aave.
Bridge funds back to Ethereum or send to exchange.
Convert to fiat via Coinbase or Binance if needed.

name: Stake ETH for Real Yield on GMX
steps: Bridge ETH to Arbitrum using Arbitrum Bridge.
Go to gmx.io and click on 'Earn'.
Stake ETH or GMX tokens in the protocol.
Start earning yield from real trading fees.
Claim rewards regularly and track APR on site.
exit_plan: Unstake from GMX.
Bridge ETH back to Ethereum or to a CEX.
Sell ETH or GMX and withdraw fiat if needed.

name: Pendle Future Yield Farming
steps: Connect MetaMask and ensure you are on Ethereum.
Go to app.pendle.finance and choose a yield-bearing token.
Split your token into YT (Yield Token) and PT (Principal Token).
Stake YT in Pendle pools for boosted yield.
Track performance and expiry dates carefully.
exit_plan: Unstake YT from Pendle.
Redeem PT + YT at or before expiry.
Convert assets back to stablecoin or ETH.

name: Single-Sided ETH Staking via Lido
steps: Buy ETH and connect MetaMask to Lido.
Go to stake.lido.fi and deposit ETH.
Receive stETH (staked ETH) in your wallet.
Track staking APR on the Lido dashboard.
Optionally use stETH in DeFi protocols.
exit_plan: Hold stETH until ETH withdrawal is available.
Swap stETH for ETH on a DEX if needed earlier.
Withdraw to CEX and convert to fiat.

name: Fantom Reaper Auto-Compounding Vaults
steps: Add Fantom network to MetaMask.
Buy FTM and swap into LP tokens on SpookySwap.
Visit reaper.farm and find a matching vault.
Deposit LP tokens and enable auto-compound.
Track performance on the vault dashboard.
exit_plan: Withdraw funds from Reaper.
Unzap LP into single tokens.
Send back to CEX or bridge to Ethereum.

name: Compound USDC Lending Strategy
steps: Connect MetaMask to app.compound.finance.
Supply USDC to the Compound protocol.
Receive cUSDC tokens representing your deposit.
Track interest accrual in real-time.
Optionally use cUSDC as collateral for borrowing.
exit_plan: Redeem cUSDC for USDC plus interest.
Transfer to Coinbase or similar exchange.
Convert to fiat if desired.
risks: Liquidation risk if used as collateral

name: Yearn USDC Vault Strategy
steps: Connect to yearn.finance with MetaMask.
Find the USDC vault in the vault list.
Deposit USDC into the automated vault.
Receive yUSDC vault tokens.
Track performance and yields automatically.
exit_plan: Withdraw from Yearn vault.
Receive USDC plus earned yield.
Transfer to preferred exchange or wallet.

name: Convex CRV Staking Strategy
steps: Acquire CRV tokens from Curve protocol.
Go to convexfinance.com and stake CRV.
Receive CVX rewards and boosted yields.
Lock CVX for additional governance benefits.
Track rewards and claim regularly.
exit_plan: Unstake CRV from Convex.
Claim all pending rewards.
Convert CRV and CVX to preferred assets.
